alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:24PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mercer and southeastern Bucks Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trenton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Ewing, Yardley, Tullytown, Edinburg, White Horse, Mercerville-Hamilton Square, Lawrenceville, Windsor, Woodside, Levittown, Morrisville, Yardville-Groveville, Fairless Hills and Woodbourne. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 8. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 59 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
